Package games.stendhal.server.entity.slot

package games.stendhal.server.entity.slot
Management of Slots. A slot is a smart list of RPObjects owned by one parent RPObject. Note: The Bank* stuff is a mechanism to access slots only in special situations. It is a general concept which is only implemented for banks at the moment.
Author:
hendrik
